string.text: 補正された@ {HeroName} with {GoldAmount}{GoldSymbol} for {CustomItemsCount}無効なカスタムアイテム
string.original: Compensated @{HeroName} with {GoldAmount}{GoldSymbol} for {CustomItemsCount} invalid custom items

string.text: @ {VictimName} {Verb} by @{KillerName}！
@ {KillerName} {Verb}！
@ {HeroName} is now level {Level}！
@ {HeroName} was taken prisoner by {PartyName}！
@ {HeroName}は捕虜になりました！
@ {HeroName} is no longer a prisoner of {PartyName}！
string.original: @{HeroName} is no longer a prisoner of {PartyName}!

string.text: @ {HeroName}はもはや囚人ではありません！
@ {HeroName} moved from {FromClanName} to {ToClanName}！
故人
引退
{OldName} is {RetireType}！
死んだまたは引退したヒーロー{OldName} renamed to {HeroName}
string.original: Dead or retired hero {OldName} renamed to {HeroName}

string.text: あなたはあなた自身のアイテムに値をつけることができません
string.original: You can't bid on your own item

string.text: {Bid}{GoldIcon} does not meet reserve price of {ReservePrice}{GoldIcon}の入札
string.original: Bid of {Bid}{GoldIcon} does not meet reserve price of {ReservePrice}{GoldIcon}

string.text: {Bid}{GoldIcon}での別の入札はすでに存在します
あなたはすでにもっと入札しました（{Bid}{GoldIcon}）、あなたはあなたの入札を上げることしかできません
string.original: You already bid more ({Bid}{GoldIcon}), you can only raise your bid

string.text: {Bid}{GoldIcon}, you only have {BidderGold}{GoldIcon}の入札をカバーすることはできません
string.original: You cannot cover a bid of {Bid}{GoldIcon}, you only have {BidderGold}{GoldIcon}

string.text: {Bid}{GoldIcon}の入札が行われました！
{Time} seconds left in auction of '{ItemName}', high bid is {HighestBid}{GoldIcon} (@{HighestBidderName}）
string.original: {Time} seconds left in auction of '{ItemName}', high bid is {HighestBid}{GoldIcon} (@{HighestBidderName})

string.text: {Time} seconds left in auction of '{ItemName} '、入札なし
string.original: {Time} seconds left in auction of '{ItemName}', no bids placed

string.text: {ItemName} is FINISHED! The item will remain with @{ItemOwnerName}, as no bid met the reserve price of {ReservePrice}{GoldIcon}のオークション。
string.original: Auction for {ItemName} is FINISHED! The item will remain with @{ItemOwnerName}, as no bid met the reserve price of {ReservePrice}{GoldIcon}.

string.text: {ItemName} is CANCELLED! @{ItemOwnerName}のオークションは引退または死亡しました。
string.original: Auction for {ItemName} is CANCELLED! @{ItemOwnerName} retired or died.

string.text: {ItemName} is CANCELLED! @{ItemOwnerName}のオークションはアイテムを所有しなくなりました。
string.original: Auction for {ItemName} is CANCELLED! @{ItemOwnerName} is no longer in possession of the item.

string.text: {ItemName} is FINISHED! The item will go to @{HighestBidderName} for {HighestBid}{GoldIcon}のオークション。
string.original: Auction for {ItemName} is FINISHED! The item will go to @{HighestBidderName} for {HighestBid}{GoldIcon}.

string.text: オークションは進行中ではありません
最大従者サイズ
従者の最大ユニット数。 20未満を推奨し、ゲームユニットの制限に従わないように召喚します。
string.original: Maximum number of units in the retinue. Recommend less than 20, summons to NOT obey the games unit limits.

string.original: Whether to use the adopted hero's culture (if not enabled then a random one is used)

UseHeroesCultureUnitsが無効になっているときに盗賊ユニットを許可するかどうか

string.original: Team name must be one of {Teams}

string.original: You can only bet on one team
